name: Maslow's Flamethrower
description:
"When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail". What would everything look like when all you have is a FRICKING FLAMETHROWER?

Game created for VimJam3. Focus: Multi-use. Theme: Turn up the heat

Controls:

Esc to recover mouse control

ASDW or arrows to move

Right click, Space or . (numpad) to jump

Mouse or 2468(numpad) to point

Left Click, Shift, 0(numpad) to literally FIRE

Q/E to switch accesories

Space/Enter to restart once dead

Gamepads should also work
